headline: Keefe Bruyette Raises its Price Target on The Travelers Companies, Inc. (TRV) to $340 and Maintains an Outperform Rating
summary: The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TRV) is among the 11 High Growth Financial Stocks to Buy Now. On February 19, 2026, Keefe Bruyette analyst Meyer Shields raised the price target on The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TRV) to $340 from $320 and maintained an Outperform rating. Meyer Shields estimates that Travelers’ year-end 2025 GAAP loss and Allocated […]
